control_attributes.control_description: The organization produces, controls, and distributes symmetric cryptographic keys using [Selection: NIST FIPS-compliant; NSA-approved] key management technology and processes.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system provides an explicit indication of current participants in [Assignment: organization-defined online meetings and teleconferences].

Control Statement: The organization produces, controls, and distributes symmetric cryptographic keys using [Selection: NIST FIPS-compliant; NSA-approved] key management technology and processes.
